scripts.prod: npm run prod:up; npm run prod:down
scripts.dev: npm run dev:up; npm run dev:down
scripts.dev:up: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file ./env/.env up --attach server --attach client --attach ansible-api
scripts.test:ct-ci: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.ct.yml --env-file ./env/.env.ci up --exit-code-from cypress --quiet-pull; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.ct.yml --env-file ./env/.env.ci down
scripts.test:e2e: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.e2e.yml --env-file ./env/.env up -d; cd ./apps/client; npm run cypress:open; cd -; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.e2e.yml --env-file ./env/.env down
scripts.test:e2e-ci: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.ci.yml --env-file ./env/.env.ci up --attach cypress --exit-code-from cypress --quiet-pull; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.ci.yml --env-file ./env/.env.ci down
